lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dan Stevens, manager of public and government affairs at Texaco Inc <TX>, operator of the pipeline through its subsidiary Texaco Pipeline Co, said the company hopes repairs will begin in about five days and expects it to take several more days to complete.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The pipeline was shut down from Cushing, Okla, to Witchita Falls, Kan, on Saturday due to an undetermined leak at the Red River crossing, near the Oklahoma/Texas border, because of severe rains, a spokesman for Texaco said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "At this point we are lining up what we know we need, to get the job done," Stevens said, adding that the timing for repairs will depend on the damage to the pipeline which is difficult to assess because of flooding on the Red River.

lst.name: sentence
